name: Destination Unknown
description:
Was created for school so, enjoy!

2D top down RPG/Puzzler.

Use arrow keys to move.

Space to attack.

Don't touch enemies without being in the middle of a attack.

Hint:Get Key on left or you'll get stuck.

Hint 2: Hit cakes to destroy them!!

Good Luck!!!

Great Gamer Make Great Games (GGMG) aka (Daniel Perju, Seamus Carrick, Jackson Erwin, and others)
